name: ChlamydiaTestsAndChlamydiaGonorrheaCombinedTestsValueSet
title: Chlamydia Tests and Chlamydia/Gonorrhea Combined Tests Value Set
description: Grouped value set combining the possible tests for chlamydia.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: For use in the Office of Population Affairs Family Planning Annual Report (FPAR) IHE Profile.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests that report on Chlamydia trachomatis OR that report on Chlamydia trachomatis/Neisseria gonorrhoeae.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )
